description: Questions covering all types of NBA player contracts including standard contracts, two-way contracts, Exhibit 10 contracts, contract amendments, renegotiations, and player contract rights

questions.question: Are players required to participate in training camp under their contract?
options: Only if specifically stated in the contract
questions.explanation: Standard NBA Player Contracts require players to attend and participate in training camp. Failure to report can result in fines and contract consequences.

questions.question: Can a player's contract specify which jersey number they will wear?
options: No, jersey numbers are team decisions only
Only if the number is retired
questions.explanation: Jersey numbers are assigned by the team and are not part of the contract negotiation. While teams may accommodate player preferences, it's not a contractual term.

questions.question: What happens if a player is suspended by the league for conduct violations?
options: They continue to receive full salary
Salary is withheld for suspension period
questions.explanation: When a player is suspended by the league, their salary is typically withheld for the duration of the suspension. The specific amount depends on the length of the suspension.

questions.question: Can a team include a provision requiring the player to live in a specific city during the offseason?
options: Yes, this is standard in all contracts
No, players have freedom of residence in offseason
Yes, but only for franchise players
questions.explanation: Teams cannot require players to live in a specific location during the offseason. Players have freedom to reside wherever they choose when not fulfilling team obligations.

questions.question: If a player is traded mid-season, who is responsible for their salary for the remainder of the season?
questions.explanation: When a player is traded, the acquiring team assumes full responsibility for the player's salary from the trade date forward. The original team is only responsible for salary earned up to the trade date.
